data.name: embed_availability_calendar
data.marketing: Adds a menu option to the misc menu option to show managers embed code for embedding their availability calendar into an off-site page. Particularly useful if you're using Jomres as a portal.
data.description: Adds a menu option to the misc menu option to show managers embed code for embedding their availability calendar into an off-site page.
data.change_log: 1.1 Jomres 9.7.4 related changes v1.2 Jomres 9.7.4 related changes v1.3 Remaining globals cleanup and jr_gettext refactor related changes. v1.4 Notices fixes. v1.5 Frontend menu refactored. v1.6 Removed a check for admin area to allow scripts to call frontend menu in the administrator area. v1.7 French language file added. v1.8 BS4 template set added v1.9 Italian language file added, thanks Nicola v2.0 Language files updated. v2.1 Bootstrap 5 template set added. v2.2 Serbian lang file updated.
data.author: Vince Wooll
